blogPost.excerpt: The data management App that gives users ownership and control of their data - Collect your data from multiple platforms - View your data in an intuitive dashboard - Choose who can access your data and who can't
blogPost.body: The data management App that gives users ownership and control of their data - Collect your data from multiple platforms - View your data in an intuitive dashboard - Choose who can access your data and who can't
blogPost.title: Rita Personal Data - Collect, view and control your data
blogPost.author: Ben Lang

localize.description: 数据管理应用程序，让用户拥有和控制他们的数据 - 从多个平台收集您的数据 - 在直观的仪表板中查看您的数据 - 选择谁可以访问您的数据，谁不能。
localize.tagline: 收集、查看和控制您的数据

localize.description: 數據管理應用程序，讓用戶擁有和控制他們的數據 - 從多個平臺收集您的數據 - 在直觀的儀表板中查看您的數據 - 選擇誰可以訪問您的數據，誰不能。
localize.tagline: 收集、查看和控制您的數據

previous.excerpt: Porter is a platform that makes AWS/GCP as easy to use as Heroku. With instant deploys from Git, built-in autoscaling, and automatic SSL, Porter gives you the convenience of a PaaS while preserving flexibility and control.
previous.title: Porter - Heroku that runs in your own cloud

localize.description: Porter是一个让AWS/GCP像Heroku一样容易使用的平台。通过Git的即时部署、内置自动缩放和自动SSL，Porter为您提供了PaaS的便利，同时保留了灵活性和控制力。
Porter是一個讓AWS/GCP像Heroku一樣容易使用的平臺。通過Git的即時部署、內置自動縮放和自動SSL，Porter爲您提供了PaaS的便利，同時保留了靈活性和控制力。
